Key Match Events: Lars Nootbaar hit a solo home run in the 7th inning to tie the game 2-2
Nathan Lukes hit an opposite-field RBI double in the 8th inning to score George Springer and break the tie
Spencer Horwitz hit a 2-run home run against Miles Mikolas in the 5th inning
Post-Match Reflections: The Cardinals were swept and fell below.500 (74-75) with 13 games remaining in the season
The Blue Jays (72-78) scored the deciding run in the 8th inning to win the game 3-2
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cardinals went 0 for 5 with runners in scoring position and left six men on base
Blue Jays starting pitchers had posted the best ERA in the majors entering Sunday's games with a 3.02 ERA
Yariel Rodriguez held the Cardinals to just one hit along with one walk and two strikeouts through his first four innings
Others: The game was played at the Rogers Centre in Toronto, Ontario, Canada
